attributes.action: Keep Welbeck Defence Sixth Form College Open
attributes.additional_details:
http://www.dsfc.ac.uk/

https://www.leicestermercury.co.uk/news/local-news/former-pupils-condemn-government-decision-2635540

It is so important that Welbeck keeps its funding as it guides young adults into their future careers in the military. The government has cut its spending meaning the military sixth form will be shut. Please support this campaign and help make something positive happen.
attributes.background:
'Welbeck is a full boarding co-educational college, funded by the Ministry of Defence (MOD).Offering an A level education to young people who wish to follow a career with the MOD'

Welbeck is important for young people who want to follow a military path and gives students a start to their future
